channel.title: About connecting multiple databases from one datasource(aws mysql)
channel.description:
Hi, I have a question about connecting datasource.
I have two database in aws rds, and would like to connect both to redash. Is it possible to connect multiple database from one datasource?(multiple DB from aws rds)

item.title: About connecting multiple databases from one datasource(aws mysql)
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
I donâ€™t think so. Since the database is selected on the data source setup screen. Technically, I believe you can still accomplish this by modifying the RDS query runner code.

Read full topic
